thread.title: 'Don't punch your girlfriend' - Evra hands out relationship advice
thread.title_full: 'Don't punch your girlfriend' - Evra hands out relationship advice

title: 'Don't punch your girlfriend' - Evra hands out relationship advice
text:
0 Mar 13, 2017 11:29:14 The former Manchester United and Juventus full-back has returned to training, and was only too pleased to tell everyone about it! 
Patrice Evra's return to Marseille has not been as smooth as he would have liked, but the France left-back has not lost any of his â€‹joie de vivre, as his latest Instagram message showed. 
Memphis explains Lyon stunner 
Former Monaco, Manchester United and Juventus defender Evra returned to Ligue 1 in January after an 11-year absence, but his first few weeks at the Stade Velodrome have not gone as well as hoped with some indifferent team performances prior to the 5-1 home humbling by Paris Saint-Germain. 
Evra came off at half-time in that setback to Marseille's arch-rivals on February 26 and has not played since. A post shared by Patrice Evra (@patrice.evra) on Mar 13, 2017 at 2:16am PDT 
He is now back running, however, and the 35-year-old was clearly pleased to share that news. 
He also had some relationship advice for all boyfriends whose partners may share Evra's excitement. Related
